title: Real Estate Dev Capstone
description: Formulation and exploration of a real estate development project. Topics include business plan, market analysis, site selection, regulations, finance, project delivery, design and engineering.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BC 6175 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 6350 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (BC 6575 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CP 6611 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CP 6640 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ARCH 6151 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
